revised_title: Refractive Indices of Gaseous Potassium, Zinc, Cadmium, Mercury, Arsenic, Selenium, and Tellurium
tldr: The authors investigate the refractive indices of gaseous potassium, zinc, cadmium, mercury, arsenic, selenium, and tellurium using a Jamin refractometer. They compare their results with previous studies and discuss the periodicity of refractive indices and its connection with atomic weight and valency.
